document_data.name: ''Champion's Symbol''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''champion's symbol''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[holy symbol]] inscribed with stylized flames that allowed the wearer to impose their will over their foes.
document_data.Powers: The ''symbol'' granted its wearer the power to dominate the will of their enemies when they struck them with a mighty weapon strike, a [[fire]]-based [[spell]], or a [[Radiant energy|radiant]] spell.
document_data.History: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''champion's symbols'' were known to be possessed by followers of [[Bane]] in [[Vaasa]]{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bitter Frost|8}} and by the [[church of Torm]], the [[church of Ilmater]], and the [[Luminous Society]] in [[Impiltur]].{{Cite lfr/IMPI1-6/The Ancient Temple|24}}{{Cite lfr/IMPI1-6/The Ancient Temple|6}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some said that the design of the ''champion's symbol'' was inspired by a legendary [[priest]] of [[Bahamut]] who used holy fire to purge his [[church of Bahamut|church]] of corruption and [[evil]] infiltrators.
